trans-unit.resname: GNT·47 | Nissa's Revelation | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Scry 5, then reveal the top card of your library. If it's a creature card, you draw cards equal to its power and you gain life equal to its toughness.
trans-unit.target: Scry 5, then reveal the top card of your library. If it's a creature card, you draw cards equal to its power and you gain life equal to its toughness.

trans-unit.source: The evil inside the mountain pulsed at Nissa in a shock wave of madness.
trans-unit.target: The evil inside the mountain pulsed at Nissa in a shock wave of madness.

trans-unit.target: Overcome

trans-unit.source: Creatures you control get +2/+2 and gain trample until end of turn. (A creature with trample can deal excess combat damage to the player or planeswalker it's attacking.)
trans-unit.target: Creatures you control get +2/+2 and gain trample until end of turn. (A creature with trample can deal excess combat damage to the player or planeswalker it's attacking.)

trans-unit.source: Look at the top four cards of your library. You may reveal a creature or land card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.
trans-unit.target: Look at the top four cards of your library. You may reveal a creature or land card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

trans-unit.resname: GNT·49 | Seek the Wilds | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "In my downtime I used to paint the vistas. Now the vistas disappear faster than my downtime."
trans-unit.target: "In my downtime I used to paint the vistas. Now the vistas disappear faster than my downtime."
